newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Hong Leong Properties in Putrajaya deal.
newsitem.headline: Hong Leong Properties in Putrajaya deal.

text.p: Hong Leong Properties Bhd said it is involved in the development and construction of certain parcels of land within Putrajaya, the site for a proposed new federal capital.

In a statement sent on Monday to the Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange, Hong Leong Properties said it has entered into a joint venture agreement with Putrajaya Holdings Sdn Bhd and its unit Putrajaya Properties Sdn Bhd for the project.
Putrajaya, located just outside Kuala Lumpur, is a multi-billion dollar government administrative centre.
The project will involve residential and commercial development covering an area of about 663.7 acres.

Under the joint venture, Hong Leong Properties said it proposes to dispose of its wholly-owned indirect unit, Sabna Development Sdn Bhd to Putrajaya Properties for 187.21 million ringgit. Sabna is principally involved in property development.
Putrajaya Properties has authorised capital of 100,000 ringgit, which will be increased to 200 million ringgit with the transaction.
